items.title: Phantom data centers: What they are (or aren’t) and why they’re hampering the true promise of AI
items.description: So-called fake data centers are a bottleneck to scaling infrastructure to keep up with compute demand for AI and other critical workloads.

items.title: Nuwa Pen uses computer vision and motion sensing to digitize the words you write on paper
items.description: Nuwa Pen is a smart ballpoint pen that digitizes the words you write on paper as you write them. Can smart pens make a comeback?

items.title: How to map OpenAI’s ChatGPT Advanced Voice Mode to your iPhone action button
items.description: Mapping ChatGPT Advanced Voice Mode to the new physical Action Button on the side of newer iPhones, just above the volume up and down.

items.title: CES 2025 preview: What to expect at tech’s biggest show | The DeanBeat
items.description: Next week at the CES 2025 trade show in Las Vegas, we'll once again be able to see and hear about the latest tech trends in person.

items.title: How Meta’s latest research proves you can use generative AI to understand user intent
items.description: By thinking about recommendation as a generative problem, you can tackle it from new angles and use LLMs to better understand user intent.
